text:
Okay Okay ,,,, Ab mai kyaa hi likhuu tumhare baare mai ................ aisa lgta hai ki bachpan se haar din hi dikhe ho tum school se coaching and phir college mai bhii ........ JIO aane se itne saal phele hi phone pe ghanto laage rhete the hum dono(atleast padhai ko leke hi ðŸ¤£). Itni jayda pen fights and gossips. And mere upaar base(NaOH) girane ke liye shukriyaa abhi taak nishaan pdaa hua haii ðŸ˜‘.  I am so sorry for not being sorry that I revealed your secret so early (not able to resist ðŸ˜¶).
Chlo atleast tumhe aakhri aate aate taak iitk mil hi gyaa wrna isse aage kya hi likhta maii. Itni masti , nautanki and irritate mai sayaad hi kisi se huaa hungaa. Itne nighouts, games aur ghoomaa hai humlog nee that you became a important part of my life. Chlo accha hua jabardasti photo keechte rhete the tum ki finally mujhe adadt ho gyii. Itna jaldi mat gussa hua krro be and hopefully humlog kaafi trips mai jaayengee aaage and jitne maaje kiye hai usse jayda hi krrengee and mehnat krte rhena aur aage badte rheenaa ðŸ˜¬ðŸ˜¬

author: Prakhar  Srivastava

text:
Yuss Deekshaa ........ I already knew about you from Riya but we only first talked at the starting of second year due to TA group â€¦â€¦â€¦. uff that confusion between gate and bottle opener and we even messed up the gate opener ðŸ˜ and why were we even doing that aesthetics course, the only aesthetic thing was that we were able to talk more and I remember calling you when sir messed up our grades in itâ˜¹. We werenâ€™t talking much during that time but it was a start of an amazing and beautiful friendshipðŸ˜. We never had same lab or group after that because the alphabets separated us >< (why D and P are so far apart ðŸ˜­).  5th sem classes were so much fun â€¦. aana toh padtaa hi thaa and padha toh jaata nhii thaa so the only other thing we could do was talk. Gradually we started talking things apart from studies and started roaming around and going to canteens and the first time I went to fountain and helicopter building. I still remember your laugh when I told you about my cycle story ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚. And you are so honest that you wrote your true details when we all went to VH-extension terrace ðŸ˜‘ðŸ˜‘, though it gave us a nice moment to have some fear and excitement at the same time. I just canâ€™t discuss paper after exam with you or it seems like everyone will kill me, so the only thing we do is cry over the paper and professor, and remember when we went to nursery after the exams (last paper kaistha sir kaa) were over, it was so peacefull and everyone sharing their storiesðŸ˜ª. I have always admired your direction sense whether be it talking the long or wrong route ðŸ˜† and you going to vishal sir office story ><
Fortunately, the lockdown didnâ€™t stop our talks and laugh, since now we have so iterations (from messenger to whatsapp to insta and discord (in progress)) of the same group and I can proudly say that we two are the ones who keep them aliveðŸ˜Ž. I canâ€™t describe how fun are the stickers fight where we change from violent to lovely ones in the nick of time and we also keep getting new ones (a fair trade i would sayðŸ˜). 
And you see no matter how much you think you have explored the campus there were always some new places which we were able to find. I was always so happy when we were able to roam around the campus and sad when you didnâ€™t come â˜¹ still I am grateful that you never got angry at me which I think you should have ðŸ˜“ . YOUR drawing in Pictionary when we played in teams was at another awesome level , your level of intellect is out of my comprehension ðŸ˜µ. And SIS guards ke saath kitne ajeeb experiences the mtlb kuch bhi ho rhaa thaa uss waktðŸ¤£. Day by Day nothing seems to have changed but now if we look back, we have come a long way ahead.  
I am just glad that I found such a beautiful, caring, hardworking, strong and talented girl as a friend ðŸ˜â¤ï¸â¤ï¸. It seems to me that you have some supernatural powers , you never seem to get tired and go on days without sleep. 
KANPUR mai rheke bhi 20 saal baad mili tumm and milne ke baad bhi itnaa nhi ghumaaa campus ke bhaar humlog nee, I hope we are able to change that after this shitty corona goes away, so much of our plans are pending, so many trips, (..) and trust me I will find a way to complete theem . 
PS: ptaa nhi saalon baad humlog khaa hongee lekin jab bhi tum yearbook dekho toh mera memoir dhundhna nhi padegaa tumhee >_<ðŸ˜‰ and you will always get your potraits every year and hopefully on the correct date :)
author: Prakhar  Srivastava

text:
YOO Shaswat, I first saw you in physics coaching( well who didn't) and we also met in comfest here and there but we never really talked that much during that time neither I ever thought you will become such a important part of my life later onn. I thought my drop year would be boring ,I hardly had anyone to talk to, neither I talked much, it was a lonely time but some good things happens at most unexpected times, mathss ki coaching mai rampwalk dekhnaa and sex-ed ki classes denaa ðŸ˜† and sir se daat khana jiski wajhe se humlog ko alag alag bhi baithna padta thaa, physics coaching mai toh kyaaa hi krrte the humlog baas peeche jaake baith krr baate krnaa 2 ghante taak, and chemistry mai toh padhna padta tha (you know why ðŸ¤«) , goli mai vada pav khana and raat mai lautte waktt burger, allen ke paper dene ke baad ghanto taak discuss krnaa ....... in the end the only thing we wanted was best for each other and meraa result bhi tumhi ne dekh liyaa the mere phele se ðŸ˜‘, we had so much fun that it doesn't seem that all of it was 4 years agoo, 
Take caree and keep having fun in whatever you do.... beech beech mai baat ya message toh krtaa rhunngaa maii ðŸ˜¬

text:

Yes cats are so cool and kawaii and so are you ðŸ˜¬. Its always to fun to spam you with stickers and that isn't going to stop anytime soon. We've hardly spent time exploring the campus or kanpur , I hope we get to do it in the last semester and makeup for the lost time.
